page.title: 20KATHRYN'S DAY
page.content: My name is Kathryn and I am 8 years old This morning I woke up at half past seven. Then I woke my sister up and I had a wash. Then I got dressed and went downstairs for my breakfast I had cornflakes and a drink of coffee. Then I went upstairs and cleaned my teeth and and I got my pixie boots on. Then I combed my hair and at quarter to nine I go to school. And when we come into assembly. And when we come back from assembly we do S.M.P.andI like S.M.P. it is my favorite subgect. Then sometimes we do about the Normans.Then in the afternoon we did about the railways and then it was playtime .We played outfor a bit then we came back in class. When I got home I played out for a while then I had my tea and went to brownies.
